H0.text: What type of camel has two humps. Mongolian

H1.text: What type of camel has two humps. Arabian

H2.text: What type of camel has two humps. Persian

H3.text: What type of camel has two humps. Bactrian

A4.text: The Bactrian camel (Camelus bactrianus) is also known as the Mongolian camel.

A5.text: The Bactrian camel has two humps on its back.

A6.text: Wild Bactrian camels critically endangered, group says.

A7.text: Bactrian Camels at the Highland Wildlife Park, Scotland.
